name: openweathermap-api-tests
description: Automated API testing suite for OpenWeatherMap using Postman and Newman

scripts.test:report: newman run collections/openweather_collection.json --environment environments/environment_file.json --env-var "OPENWEATHER_API_KEY=$OPENWEATHER_API_KEY" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/test-report.html
scripts.test:ci: newman run collections/openweather_collection.json --environment environments/environment_file.json --env-var "OPENWEATHER_API_KEY=$OPENWEATHER_API_KEY" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export reports/results.json --bail
scripts.security:scan: echo 'Running security scan...' && grep -r 'sk_\|pk_\|password\|secret' collections/ environments/ || echo 'No secrets found'
scripts.setup: mkdir -p reports && echo 'Setup complete. Add your API key to the environment file.'
